desc: Track, discover, and get notified about movies
Browse and track movies by genre, release date, rating, etc

desc: Browse, book, and manage accommodations with ease

Fast, protected checkout with multiple payment options

items.title: HireHub

items.title: IntelliCode
desc: Turns your voice into working code
Generates clean, structured code instantly
Smart enough to recognize coding logic, syntax, and common patterns
Auto-completes, optimizes, and improves the spoken logic

items.title: Tuneology
desc: See, hear, and isolate instruments from any song using Augmented Reality

items.title: Apocalypse

items.title: Accident Prevention System
desc: Monitor driver behavior and prevent accidents before they happen

Sends real-time audio or vibration alerts to wake drowsy drivers
